Here is the list of signs at $LINE, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural leadership and boldness make Aries a strong contender for success, but impulsiveness can hinder progress.
2. Taurus - 5/10 - Pragmatic and detail-oriented, Tauruses are solid workers, but stubbornness can hold them back from reaching full potential.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis excel at communication and problem-solving, but scatterbrained tendencies can impede focus.
4. Cancer - 9/10 - Emotionally intelligent and nurturing, Cancers have a strong connection to others and are excellent caregivers, but emotional instability can affect stability.
5. Leo - 6/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos shine in creative fields, but ego and competitiveness can lead to burnout.
6. Virgo - 8/10 - Analytical and detail-focused, Virgos excel at organization and planning, but perfectionism can hinder progress due to indecision.
7. Libra - 5/10 - Diplomatic and harmonious, Librans are excellent mediators, but indecisiveness and people-pleasing can lead to stagnation.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios have a strong connection to their emotions and are naturally intuitive, but emotional depth can be overwhelming at times.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians excel at exploration and expansion, but impulsiveness and overconfidence can lead to mistakes.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Disciplined and ambitious, Capricorns are natural leaders, but rigidity and fear of failure can stifle creativity.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Innovative and humanitarian, Aquarians excel at innovation and social impact, but detachment and aloofness can make connections difficult.
12. Pisces - 4/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces are naturally creative, but emotional fragility and lack of grounding can hinder stability.
Note: These scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations.
